QuestData.Title: Looking for Lumber
QuestData.Description: Some of the trees around here look small enough that the workers should be able to down them in no time.$b$bWe can leave the hard labor to Shelly's men, but if you'd be willing to mark the trees for them to start with, we should be able to get this operation rolling much faster.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect.$b$bNot only will this lumber do the job, it will look fantastic!
